item.title: ClickIt v1.4.6
item.description:
# ClickIt v1.4.6
ðŸŽ‰ **Native macOS Auto-Clicker Application**
## âœ¨ Features - ðŸ–±ï¸ **Precision Clicking**: Sub-10ms timing accuracy - ðŸŒ **Universal Binary**: Native support for Intel x64 + Apple Silicon - ðŸŽ¯ **Background Operation**: Works without requiring app focus - âš¡ **Global Hotkeys**: ESC key controls for instant stop - ðŸ”§ **Advanced Configuration**: CPS rates, click types, and presets - ðŸ‘ï¸ **Visual Feedback**: Real-time overlay indicators - ðŸ”„ **Auto-Updates**: Built-in Sparkle framework integration
## ðŸ“‹ System Requirements - **macOS**: 14.0 or later - **Architecture**: Universal Binary (Intel x64 + Apple Silicon) - **Permissions**: Accessibility and Screen Recording access required
## ðŸš€ Installation 1. Download `ClickIt.app.zip` below 2. Extract and move `ClickIt.app` to Applications folder 3. First launch: Right-click â†’ Open (to bypass Gatekeeper) 4. Grant Accessibility and Screen Recording permissions when prompted
## ðŸ“ˆ Changes Since v1.4.5 ``` - fix: Add missing permissions for GitHub Actions in release workflow ```
---
ðŸ—ï¸ **Built with**: Xcode on GitHub Actions ðŸ“… **Build Date**: 2025-07-21 03:03:28 UTC ðŸ”– **Version**: 1.4.6 ðŸŽ¯ **Target**: macOS 14.0+

item.title: ClickIt v1.2.0

item.title: ClickIt v1.1.1
item.description:
## What's New in v1.1.1
- ðŸ”§ **Enhanced Fastlane Automation**: Improved auto_prod lane to handle existing tags gracefully without failing - ðŸ·ï¸ **Better Error Handling**: Fixed tag creation logic to skip existing tags instead of erroring out - âš™ï¸ **Improved Release Workflow**: More robust automated release process with better validation
## Bug Fixes
- Fixed `auto_prod` lane failing when trying to create already existing tags - Improved tag existence checking using `git rev-parse --verify` - Enhanced error messages and workflow clarity
## Technical Improvements
- Updated `fastlane/Fastfile` with better tag handling logic - Added proper tag existence validation before attempting creation - Improved release automation reliability
This release includes the ClickIt.app bundle for macOS 15.0+

item.title: ClickIt
item.description:
Production release of ClickIt - Native macOS Auto-Clicker
**ðŸŽ¯ Features:** - Precision clicking automation - Window targeting - Global hotkey controls (ESC) - Visual feedback overlay - Universal binary (Intel + Apple Silicon)
**ðŸ“± Installation:** 1. Download ClickIt.app.zip 2. Unzip and move ClickIt.app to Applications 3. Grant required permissions in System Settings > Privacy & Security: - Accessibility (for mouse events) - Screen Recording (for window detection)
**ðŸ“‹ System Requirements:** - macOS 15.0 or later - Intel Mac or Apple Silicon Mac
